looper.selectBarsCount: Select the bars count to loop

about.mainTitle: Learn to play without notes! Bagpipe and flute training app
about.listDescription: Melodies that can be played on the selected instrument. It can be changed in settings
about.settingsDescription:
change instrument
change the tone of the melody to match your instrument
preclick - additional countdown to the start of the performance to blow the bagpipe, prepare
change language
about.updates:
You can loop 1, 2, 4, 6, 8 bars of your choice - press and hold the button with round arrows
Support the project - a button with a cup of coffee
about.updates_short: New melodies: Troll' Gnyot El' - CHto Sovoj Ob Pen', Troll' Gnyot El' - Tancy Trollej, Pol'ka Glybockaya, Korpiklaani - Tuli Kokko, Metsatöl - Ema hääl kutsub, Metsatöl - Saaremaa Vägimees, Perciwal - A story you wont believe, W moim ogródecku, Znich - Belarus

feedback.sendFeedback: If you see an error, have a suggestion, or just want to say thank you - write to me!
feedback.name: Name

mainPage.title: DudaHero: Where Tradition Meets Innovation
mainPage.subtitle: The app to learn how to play bagpipes. No music theory is needed anymore.
mainPage.aims: Duda Hero aims to solve the challenge of finding a bagpipe teacher, especially for less common types of bagpipes.
mainPage.bagpipes: The next types of bagpipes are available to learn:
mainPage.other: Other bagpipes types are in development!
mainPage.melodies: Now in the app you can find tutorials for at least 120 folk melodies from different countries, sorted by country of origin.

login.reminderText: Logging in will help you save your settings, language, instrument type, tuning, and open the last played song on start. In the future, you will be able to write comments and see other users' playing progress and experience.

noSong.title: Song Unavailable
noSong.text: The selected song cannot be played on the chosen instrument.
noSong.tryChange: Please try changing the song or adjust the instrument settings.

continueModal.title: Welcome back!
continueModal.body: You have returned to the application.
